plugin-data.name: Shortcode API
plugin-data.description: The Shortcode API is a simple set of functions for creating Bludit shortcodes for use in posts and pages.
plugin-data.author: Fred K., Bludit & Sergey Romanenko

this-page-is-for-edit/add-shortcodes.-do: This page is for edit/add shortcodes. Don't forget to share your best shorctcodes with Bludit community!
